flawed_nl_solution:
When Jennifer is 30 years old in ten years, her sister Jordana will be 3*30=<<3*30=90>>90 years old.
She's currently 10 years younger, so she's 90 - 10 = <<90-10=70>>70 years old

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 80, not 70. It appears there was a miscalculation with the digits before the final zero.
